org.easybatch.core.reader

Class FileRecordReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easybatch.core.reader.FileRecordReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordReader

    public class FileRecordReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements RecordReader
    A convenient RecordReader that recursively reads files in a directory.

    This reader produces FileRecord instances.

    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileRecordReader(java.io.File directory)
      Create a FileRecordReader to read files recursively from a given directory.

      Get the total record number in the data source.

      Check if the directory has a next file.

      Open the reader.

        public java.lang.Long getTotalRecords()

        Specified by:
